mapper.insert: insert into calendar (title, start, end, allDay, color, user_id, className, textColor) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{start,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{end,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{allDay,jdbcType=BIT}, #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{textColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select c.id,c.title,c.start,c.end,c.allDay,c.color,c.user_id,c.className,c.textColor, e.id as emp_id,e.username as emp_username from calendar c left join employee e on c.user_id=e.id
mapper.update: update calendar set start = DATE_ADD(start,INTERVAL #{startInt} DAY),end = DATE_ADD(end,INTERVAL #{endInt} DAY) where id=#{id}
